info.title: ietf-yang-push Event Notifications
info.description:
This module contains IETF YANG definitions for YANG push event notifications.

**Event Notifications Module** - Used for model-driven telemetry and streaming subscriptions.

**Usage**: Subscribe to events via NETCONF/RESTCONF subscriptions

**Protocol**: RFC 8639 (Subscription to YANG Notifications)

**Authentication**: HTTP Basic Authentication

**YANG Model:** [ietf-yang-push.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/ietf-yang-push.yang)

**ðŸŒ³ YANG Tree:** [View ietf-yang-push structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/ietf-yang-push.html)

get.description: Periodic push update notification with datastore contents
On-change push update notification with datastore changes
